name: Enlightenment: Sunset Melted
desc: Every time an enemy target is hit by different ally targets, decreases their DMG dealt by 3% for up to 6 stacks, lasting till the end of the turn.
enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target is hit by different ally targets, decreases their DMG dealt by 4% for up to 6 stacks, lasting till the end of the turn.
